title: Eva Longoria gets parenting advice from BFF and 'perfect mum' Victoria Beckham
text:

Being able to juggle motherhood, with a fantastic and a successful marriage is no mean feat.

So it's come as no surprise that Victoria Beckham is who Eva Longoria turns to for parenting adivce.

The former Desperate Housewives actress revealed to Hello magazine that she turns to the fashion designer and close friend for pearls of wisdoms about her son-year-old son Santiago.

Victoria and hubby David have four children Brooklyn, 20, Romeo, 17, Cruz, 14 and eight-year-old Harper Seven.

(Image: Getty Images for VF)

Eva is in London to attend the annual gala for the Global Gift Foundation, a charity she runs.

Speaking at the event she said: "Victoria is an amazing mum, she's probably one of the first people I turn to for advice.

"Plus her kids are older so she's already been through it!"

Eva also relies on another Beckham in the family as Harper Seven and Santiago have a special bond between them.

(Image: Getty Images)

"Harper's in love with Santi. I have a built in babysitter," Eva laughed.

The 44-year-old said since becoming a mum her views towards charity work has ramped up.

She said: "Once I became a mum, nothing surprises me. People asked me, 'what's surprising' and I say, 'nothing.'

"Then I realised my philanthropy became so much more intense.

(Image: AFP via Getty Images)

"I actually have anxiety about leaving the world a better place now because of my son, I'm like 'oh my god we have to do more!!' so the stakes are higher."

With the Global Gift Foundation, Eva launched The Girls In Action Alliance, which aims to get young girls into science, technology, engineering and maths.
description: The former Desperate Housewives actress said she turns to the fashion designer and close friend for her pearls of wisdoms
